snippet.title: Sheeple Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
Hello there, Sheeple!

Sheeple will be receiving a free multiplayer Demo on Steam! Today, it is announced that the Demo will contain 10 cards and 10 units on its release available for free to the players, as well as 5 separate biomes and an online multiplayer mode.

To celebrate the announcement of Sheeple's Demo, I present before you a new Sheeple Walk Trailer!

Have a fruitful day!
Leon

Wishlist Sheeple On Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/29...

The game that I'm developing as an indie game dev is called Sheeple! It's a 2D Pixel Art Autobattler with Rougelike Deckbuilder Elements, and it has Sheep! #indiegame #gamedesign #unity #unityengine #gaming #gamedevelopment #pixelart #gameengine #Sheeple  #sheepgame

Music By: Mykhailo Kripak
